author: 0xraino
content: The first test has only 1 legacy transaction, so it makes sense that the receipt root for that test should remain unchanged before and after 2718/2930 changes. I get the same root before and after 2718/2930 changes `0xaeacd02adac6f41d828cbbb411dd3b85b3bf0183d26882325a058c414952845e` but you guys have your receipt root as `0x47aa18b09c6baf3768802156b2aa811734a73a2d27ca48eb6446b06212297375`
